channel.title: Comments on: MLRS – My Little Relay Station
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: Someone who is being called to reserve duty so often should know that MLRS also stands for Military Library Research Service... (and not to mention the railway station for a relaxing stay in the hills of Adelaide)
item.content:encoded: Someone who is being called to reserve duty so often should know that MLRS also stands for Military Library Research Service… (and not to mention the railway station for a relaxing stay in the hills of Adelaide)
